Articles.Content:
I can't transfer between two tanks.

I have reinstalled the game without mods, the tanks are linked to one another without a heatshield or anything in between.

I have selected and unselected "resource transfer obeys crossfeed rules"

No luck. Anything else I can try?!

Welcome to the forum, @GPERKINS.

If you are playing career you need to upgrade the Research and development building. This is necessary to transfer propellant.

Edited April 16, 2019 by James Kerman
spellink.

Thanks! That must be it.

First time in playing Career in a long while! Usually science.
I'm happy this solves your problem. I have moved your thread to Gameplay Questions, in case someone else has the same issue.
